name: luklem3
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3
body: |- wi(w0, wi(wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), w2), wi(w3, w2)))

stmt.origin: luklem1(w0, wi(wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), w2), wi(w3, w2)), wi(wn(w0), wn(w3)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wi(wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), w2), wi(w3, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w0), wn(w3)))
-| wi(wi(wn(w0), wn(w3)), wi(wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), w2), wi(w3, w2)))

|- wi(w0, wi(wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), w2), wi(w3, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wi(wn(w0), wn(w3)))
-| wi(wi(wn(w0), wn(w3)), wi(wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), w2), wi(w3, w2)))

|- wi(w0, wi(wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), w2), wi(w3, w2)))
-| wi(wi(wn(w0), wn(w3)), wi(wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), w2), wi(w3, w2)))

body.origin: |- wi(wi(wn(w0), wn(w3)), wi(wi(wi(wn(w0), w1), w2), wi(w3, w2)))

comment: Used to rederive standard propositional axioms from Lukasiewicz'. (Contributed by NM, 22-Dec-2002.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
